title: Gamification Escape Game for Enhancing Patient Safety and Teamwork

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of nursing or healthcare services
context.additional_context: Patient safety and teamwork enhancement program for current professionals. Implemented in smartphone-based limited-technology environments. Formative assessments continuously monitor learner comprehension and collaboration skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain core patient safety concepts (e.g., error prevention, infection control) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply teamwork skills (communication, role distribution) to real-world scenarios through gamification-based group activities.
Learners practice response strategies for patient safety crises at least three times while solving escape game scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
